name: Joseph Anderson
description: I have a good heart, I am a God-fearing person,i am romantic, loyal, sincere man. My personality is quiet, stable, introspective, calm, honest. I like when I look good, so I take care of myself. The only thing I hate and cannot accept is lie. I am open for new relationships now. I would call myself a cat! because I know how to adjust to the situation . when I feel tension in the atmosphere, can easily diffuse the situation . but if I feel the danger is always on the lookout for, and I can show claws . I like traveling, read (if i have time), visit exhibitions and theater, just lay on the beach and many other things. I like take care of my loved ones.I prefer to communicate with serious woman who knows what she wants from life.I like wild nature walking, sea, wind and surf, stars,sky,yet all will not list.I love Cycling, horse riding,basketball,table tennis,dancing.I am interested in someone with the same similarities like communicative, flexible, confident, sociable, honest, kind,caring and responsible. I am looking for a certain lady for those who need to see a friend and a partner in a man. I want to find a woman who will share with me all my thoughts, wishes. Dream about strong lady in physical and moral plans, who like life in all it`s manifestations.
